metadata.synopsis: Steeps Evacuation: a family tries to get smuggled past the absolute ships and out of the city. They don't have enough cash so dad decides to stay and let mum and the kids leave first. This is the wife, Leepak Brislen.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -218;9;-158- Talk to the human female (Mother).

0.speaker: Leepak Brislen
0.text: I hate this! That lousy smuggler won't take all of us because we can't afford four berths. Greedy bastard!

1.speaker: Leepak Brislen
1.text: Oh, thank you, saer, thank you! I just couldn't bear to leave our girls' father behind!
